title: Rough Waters
description: High waves bombard the ship
action_taken_B: Brave the waters

title: Approaching Storm
description: The crew sees dark clouds on the horizon
action_taken_B: Alter ship's course

title: Caught in Storm
description: The ship is caught in a sudden storm
action_taken_B: Drop anchor and weather the storm

title: Crew Mutiny
description: Crew rebels against the captain
action_taken_B: Kill the mutiny's leader

title: Navigation Error
description: A miscalculation results in a navigation error
action_taken_B: Attempt to follow the original course

title: Fire on the Ship
description: A fire in the galley spread towards the gunpowder magazine
action_taken_A: Form bucket brigade and throw barrels of gunpowder overboard
action_taken_B: Sail upwind to blow flames away from ship and attempt to smother the fire

title: Food Shortage
description: Food spoils due to saltwater contaimination and heat
action_taken_B: Search for land and try to resupply

title: Water Shortage
description: Fresh water spills from water casks due to improper storage  and rough seas
action_taken_B: Return to pirate haven to resupply

title: Smallpox Outbreak
description: Smallpox begins to spread among the crew from an infected crew member
action_taken_B: Force infected crew to abandon ship using the ship's boats

title: Foggy Waters
description: A dense fog envelops the ship
action_taken_B: Drop anchor and wait for fog to clear

title: Ship Runs Aground
description: Ship strikes a barrier reef in shallow water
action_taken_A: Attempt to free the ship using anchors and ropes
action_taken_B: Use the ship's longboat to search for nearby land

title: Sudden Squall
description: A small, unexpected squall suddenly hits the ship
action_taken_A: Drop the sails to reduce wind resistance and stabilize the ship
action_taken_B: Adjust the course to angle the ship into the wind and ride it out

title: Unfamiliar Waters
description: The ship enters an unknown and dangerous part of the sea
action_taken_A: Carefully navigate using the stars and compass
action_taken_B: Risk a faster route through uncharted waters

title: Pirate Encounter
description: Another pirate ship is spotted on the horizon
action_taken_A: Avoid the pirates and continue on your way
action_taken_B: Make contact with ship and form alliance to attack a coastal city

title: Rogue Wave
description: A massive, unpredictable wave strikes the ship
action_taken_A: Main the pumps and bail out the water
action_taken_B: Abandon the ship and escape in the ship's boats

title: Whale Carcass
description: Crew sights a whale carcass floating on the surface of the water
action_taken_A: Collect and harvest the carcass for oil, blubber, and baleen
action_taken_B: Ignore the whale carcass and continue with your journey

title: Sinking Ship Sighted
description: A nearby ship is seen sinking, potentially in need of help
action_taken_A: Rescue survivors from the sinking ship
action_taken_B: Ignore the survivors and collect loot

title: Man overboard
description: Crew member working the sails loses balance and falls into the sea below
action_taken_A: Deploy jolly boat to rescue crew member
action_taken_B: Use ropes and boat hook to try to rescue crew member

title: Violation of Pirate Code
description: Crewmember commits an infraction against pirate code
action_taken_A: Flog the crew member but allow them to stay on the crew
action_taken_B: Set crewmember adrift in one of the ship's small boats

title: Calm Sea
description: The sea becomes unexpectedly calm and still
action_taken_A: Take advantage of the calm for rest and repairs
action_taken_B: Use the opportunity to move the ship further along the course

title: Treasure Hunt
description: The crew discovers a map leading to hidden treasure on a remote island.
action_taken_A: Follow the path on the map to the treasure
action_taken_B: Go in a straight line to the treasure's location

title: Deserted Island
description: The ship comes across an uninhabited island with potential resources.
action_taken_A: Gather food and materials for ship repairs
action_taken_B: Gather valuable trade goods and treasure

title: Lost Crew Member
description: A crew member goes missing after a shore excursion.
action_taken_A: Wait for the crew member to return to the ship
action_taken_B: Deploy a search party to find the crew member

title: Shipwrecked Goods
description: A shipwreck is found on the shore with salvageable goods.
action_taken_A: Search the wreck for food and resources
action_taken_B: Search the wreck for gold and treasure

title: Pirates' Hideout
description: The crew stumbles upon an old pirate hideout with goods to steal.
action_taken_A: Gather the treasure and resources that are easily found
action_taken_B: Search through the more dilapidated sections of the hideout for hidden goods

title: Lost in the Jungle
description: The crew gets lost in a thick jungle while searching for resources.
action_taken_A: Retrace your footsteps to return to the ship
action_taken_B: Set the jungle on fire to clear a path

title: Coastal Harvest
description: You happen across a large amount of coastal resources.
action_taken_B: Dive for pearls and other valuables

title: Trade with Locals
description: The crew meets locals on a nearby island and they wish to trade with you.
action_taken_B: Trade with the locals peacefully

title: Forbidden Temple
description: The crew finds an ancient temple rumored to hold riches.
action_taken_A: Take your time completing each of the puzzels and traps
action_taken_B: Rush through the temple, using force to make your way through

title: Desert Crossing
description: The crew navigates through a desert following a treasure map you found.
action_taken_A: Ensure you have all the necessary supplies before heading out
action_taken_B: Head into the desert immediately to ensure you can retieve the treasure

title: Pirate Hunter
description: A bounty hunter has caught wind of the crew's hideout and is actively searching for them.
action_taken_A: Stand and fight off the bounty hunter
action_taken_B: Pack up only the most valuable supplies and escape before the bounty hunter arrives

title: Tavern Informant
description: A crew member hears whispers about an informant selling pirate whereabouts for gold.
action_taken_A: Kill the informant so they can't reveal information about you
action_taken_B: "Convince" the informant to reveal the location of your rivals

title: Spy Network
description: A local spy has been gathering information about your crew and plans to alert the authorities.
action_taken_A: Kill the spy before any information can be revealed
action_taken_B: Convince the spy to join your crew

title: Captured at the Market
description: Crew members get recognized in a bustling market or village square. The authorities are alerted.
action_taken_A: Leave the crew member to be captured and escape the port
action_taken_B: Rescue the crew member, risking the capture of more crew members

title: Search Party
description: A naval search party is dispatched to find and capture you. They are scouring the coastline.
action_taken_A: Risk capture and make landfall to gather resources
action_taken_B: Don't make landfall and return to the sea

title: Betrayed by a Local
description: A local villager betrays the crew in exchange for gold.
action_taken_A: Burn and pillage the village to set an example
action_taken_B: Leave the island quickly to avoid unnecessary conflict

title: Pirate Haven Raid
description: Authorities raid a known pirate haven in search of crews.
action_taken_A: Abandon the haven and with it the resources you have stashed there
action_taken_B: Join the other pirates in fighting off the invading authorities

title: Rumor at the Dock
description: Pirates are spotted at the docks by a merchant crew who’s eager to profit from your location.
action_taken_A: Preemptively attack the pirates and merchants before they can attack
action_taken_B: Convince the merchants to betray the other pirates

title: Naval Patrol Arrival
description: A nearby naval patrol is on high alert and combing coastal towns for pirate crews.
action_taken_A: Pretend to be a merchant ship to get past the patrol
action_taken_B: Charge forward proudly flying the jolly roger

title: Public Outing
description: A pirate captain gets publicly recognized by a former associate who now works for the authorities.
action_taken_A: Rescue the captain from the authorities
action_taken_B: Capture the captain and collect the reward

title: Merchant Ambush
description: A lone merchant ship sails nearby with minimal escort.
action_taken_B: Let it pass

title: Rival Pirates
description: A rival pirate crew challenges you in open waters.
action_taken_B: Attempt to flee

title: Port Blockade
description: A port is under blockade by enemy forces.
action_taken_B: Wait it out

title: Naval Escort
description: You spot a cargo ship being protected by a naval escort.
action_taken_B: Trail them for later

title: Night Raid
description: A sleeping crew lies anchored and unaware of your ship.
action_taken_B: Fire cannons from afar

title: Hostile Boarding
description: An enemy ship attempts to board your vessel during a storm.
action_taken_B: Evade using the storm

title: Smuggler Standoff
description: You cross paths with smugglers guarding a secret shipment.
action_taken_B: Try to negotiate

title: Surprise Cannon Fire
description: You're ambushed by a hidden shore battery while sailing close to land.
action_taken_B: Retreat to deeper water

title: Dueling Captains
description: Another pirate captain challenges yours to a one-on-one duel.
action_taken_B: Refuse and prepare battle

title: Outgunned
description: You spot a heavily armed ship carrying valuable cargo.
action_taken_B: Shadow and wait to strike

title: Marooned Mutineers
description: You find crew marooned after a failed mutiny.
action_taken_B: Leave them behind

title: Dockside Ambush
description: Rival pirates lie in wait at a secluded dock.
action_taken_B: Flee and regroup

title: Raided Outpost
description: A coastal outpost has been sacked—survivors request help.
action_taken_B: Ignore the request

title: Mercenary Offer
description: Mercenaries offer their services for a price.
action_taken_B: Save the coin and move on

title: Escaped Prisoners
description: Escaped naval prisoners offer to join your crew.
action_taken_B: Refuse and send them away

title: Coastal Raid
description: A small seaport town lies vulnerable to attack.
action_taken_B: Sneak in to quietly steal goods

title: Sabotaged Supplies
description: Saboteurs have poisoned part of your provisions.
action_taken_B: Pawn off the poisoned provisions on a revial crew

title: Siege at Sea
description: You're caught between two warring ships exchanging fire.
action_taken_B: Lay low and wait it out

title: Captain’s Challenge
description: A crew member questions your leadership and demands a vote.
action_taken_B: Allow the vote

title: Stolen Map
description: Another crew tries to steal your treasure map.
action_taken_B: Let them have it
